tweets.text:
This week I met some incredible high school students mobilizing a rally in Pinellas County, FL to bring awareness to gun violence and demand change.

Whatever your politics, encourage these leaders of today & tomorrow.

Info at @pcspgv.

In Massachusetts, anyone who wishes to purchase or own a gun must first apply for a license. To obtain this license, prospective gun owners must apply and interview *in-person* with their local chief of police or an authorized designee. 

We should do this everywhere.

This Wednesday, March 14th, students are walking out of class for 17 minutes at 10am across time zones to demand Congress act NOW to end gun violence. Wear orange in solidarity + text P2P to RTVOTE (788-683) to register to vote. Join @womensmarchy in saying #ENOUGH! https://t.co/cShGbQfWGX
